mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_question_grading WHERE question_seq = cast(#{question_seq} as integer) ORDER BY grading_order
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_question_grading ( grading_seq, question_seq, grading_input, grading_output, grading_order ) VALUES ( nextval('sq_tb_question_grading'), cast(#{question_seq} as integer), #{grading_input}, #{grading_output}, CAST(#{grading_order} as integer) )
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_question_grading SET grading_input = #{grading_input}, grading_output = #{grading_output}, grading_order = CAST(#{grading_order} as integer) WHERE question_seq = CAST(#{question_seq} as integer)
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM tb_question_grading WHERE 1 = 1 AND question_seq = CAST(#{question_seq} as integer)
